parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "image_classification",
"details": {
"software": {
"mlperf_logging": "used for compliance checking and logging events",
"mxnet": "deep learning framework used for the model",
"nccl-tests": "used for running NCCL bandwidth tests",
"python": "used for scripting and running the benchmark",
"srun": "used for launching tasks on the SLURM cluster",
"enroot": "used for managing containers",
"nvidia-smi": "used for monitoring GPU status",
"ibv_devinfo": "used for listing IB devices",
"bash": "used for running shell commands",
"jq": "used for manipulating JSON data",
"mlperf_log_utils": "used for MLPerf logging",
"compliance_checker": "used for checking MLPerf compliance",
"power_monitor.sh": "used for measuring power consumption"
},
"resources": {
"SLURM": "used for job scheduling and resource management",
"DGXSYSTEM": "assumed to be a DGX system",
"CONT": "a container image containing the benchmark code and dependencies",
"DATADIR": "the directory where the dataset is stored",
"LOGDIR": "the directory where the results are logged",
"API_LOG_DIR": "the directory where API logs are stored",
"POWERCMDDIR": "the directory containing the power monitoring script",
"JET_DIR": "the directory containing Jet CLI tools"
},
"environment_variables": {
"MLPERF_RULESET": "the MLPerf ruleset version to use",
"MLPERF_CLUSTER_NAME": "the name of the MLPerf cluster",
"NEXP": "the number of experiments to run",
"DATESTAMP": "the date and time of the experiment",
"CLEAR_CACHES": "whether to clear the system caches before each experiment",
"CHECK_COMPLIANCE": "whether to check MLPerf compliance after each experiment",
"TIME_TAGS": "whether to enable time tags in the log files",
"NVTX_FLAG": "whether to enable NVTX profiling",
"NCCL_TEST": "whether to run NCCL bandwidth tests",
"SYNTH_DATA": "whether to use synthetic data",
"EPOCH_PROF": "whether to profile each epoch",
"DISABLE_CG": "whether to disable CUDA graphs",
"SEED": "the random seed for the experiment",
"API_LOGGING": "whether to enable API logging",
"JET": "whether to use Jet CLI tools for logging",
"MNT_TARFILE_PATH": "the path to the tarfile containing the dataset on a remote disk",
"TMP_ROOT_PATH": "the path to the temporary directory on the local disk",
"TMP_MD5SUM": "the MD5 checksum of the dataset",
"CODEDIR": "the directory containing the copy-data.sh script",
"COPY_DATASET": "the directory containing the dataset to copy",
"BATCHSIZE": "the batch size used in the experiment",
"DGXNNODES": "the number of DGX nodes used",
"DGXNGPU": "the number of GPUs per node",
"JET_CREATE": "the Jet create command",
"JET_UPLOAD": "the Jet upload command",
"GPCCLK": "the GPU core clock frequency"
}
}
```
